name: Devi Plinko
description:
Welcome to Devi Plinko!

The only controls are to click.

** This game is not in full release yet **

Credits

Made by SaladPizza

Art by Devi_Cat

Sounds by Devi_Cat

Music by GlitchxCity

12/08/2016 - The shop is now live! Make sure to spend your cakes (although there's only one item so far)!

11/18/2016 - Welcome to our first event! It's Devi's birthday, and you know what that means! Get geared up for a grand celebration with party hats and presents. Enjoy the birthday theme this weekend (Friday - Sunday). This theme will be able to be purchased permanently for cupcakes in a future update!
